products.name: Giant Pocky Chocolate
products.description: Pocky is a sweet biscuit covered in milk chocolate. This version of Pocky has been super-sized for better snackabillity.

products.description: Moist cookies filled with chocolate chips. This pack features characters from the famous anime One Piece.

products.name: Nobel Super Soda Candy
products.description: This candy has the best soda flavor. These hard candies have a sour coating on the outside and are fizzy and sweet in the inside. Like a ramune soda.

products.name: Puccho Gummy Candy- Cola & Lemon

products.name: Kit Kat Japanese Sake Flavor
products.description: The elegant taste od sake is mixed with the sweetness of chocolate. Alcohol content is 0.8% (Not for minors)

products.name: Ramune Soda
products.description: Popular japanese soda that is fizzy and refreshing. Comes in a wide variety of flavors in 6oz bottles.

products.name: Hi-Chew Assorted Pack
products.description: Hi-Chew is an icon candy in Japan. Each piece is like chewing gum but can be swallowed. Comes in over 170 flavors.

products.name: Azumino Wasabi Chips
products.description: These stacked potato chips are generously coated with azumino wasabi powder from Azumino City, which is know for its wasabi.

products.name: Cheetos Hot & Sweet
products.description: The hot and flaming flavor you love now with a cheesy sweetness.

products.name: Mochi Mango Flavor
products.description: The tangy and sweet taste of premium mangos combined with the softness of the rice cake.

products.name: Cowboy Bebop
products.description: The extravegant bounty hunters are back and on the hunt for new targets. Cowboy bebop blends jazz music with over the top science fiction.

products.name: Attack on Titan Season 1
products.description: In this fiction tale the world has been devastated by beasts called Titans. They have beem roaming the world killing humankind for hundreds of years.

products.name: Tokyo Ghoul Vols. 1-14
products.description: This follows the story of Ken Kaneki, a simingly ordinary college students, until an encounter with an unexpected individual causes him to be the first half-human, half-ghoul hybrid.

products.name: My Hero Academia Vols. 1-15
products.description: What would the world would look like if 80% of the population acquired superpowers? Follow the story of young Izuku Midoriya and his struggel of becoming a hero without superpowers.

products.name: One Piece Vols. 1-23
products.description: Follow the story of Monkey D. Luffy is in search of the greates pirate treasure there is, the one piece, but he'll have to face enemies beyond his imagination while making new friends on his journey.

products.name: Naruto Shippuden Vols. 49-72
products.description: Naruto is a ninja-in-training with a need for attention, a knack for mischief and, sealed within him, a strange, formidable power.

products.name: Demon Slayer Vols. 1-5
products.description: In Taisho-era Japan, Tanjiro Kamado is a kindhearted boy who makes a living selling charcoal. But his peaceful life is shattered when a demon slaughters his entire family.
